item.description:
Meriden's Largest and most colorful festival, the "Meriden Daffodil Festival," will celebrates 32 years.



600,001 daffodils can't be wrong! They create a sea of fragrant yellow blossoms throughout the 1,800-acre Hubbard Park in Meriden, Connecticut each year. You'll not only see an amazing 61 different varieties of daffodils, there will also be crafts, amusement rides, food, entertainment, and a fireworks display.

Click here for this year's band information.

Christine Ohlman and Rebel Montez will be playing The Bandshell Stage on Saturday from 4:15 to 5:15.

The Bernadettes will be playing The Bandshell Stage on Saturday from 7:00-8:30.

Fireworks at 8:30 pm.

Shuttle bus services available. Please see the Festival website for complete information. The park is located just off exit 4, I-691.

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: Meriden Daffodil Fest., Sat., April 24, 2010- w/Bernadettes & Christine Ohlman!
